articles.title: Boston Celtics among teams to engage in talks with Brooklyn Nets on possible Kevin Durant deal, sources say
articles.description: The Celtics have emerged among teams engaged in talks on a possible deal for Nets star Kevin Durant, sources told ESPN, with their ability to include Jaylen Brown as a centerpiece in any offer helping make Boston formidable in its pursuit.
articles.content:
As Brooklyn Nets star Kevin Durant's trade request approaches a fourth week, the Boston Celtics have emerged among teams engaged in talks on a possible deal, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: Sydney McLaughlin, relay team gives Americans their 33rd medal at track world championships
articles.description: Sydney McLaughlin took the last victorious lap of an All-American world championships Sunday, pulling away in the 4x400-meter relay to close a U.S. runaway and give the Americans their record 33rd medal of the meet in Oregon.
articles.content: EUGENE, Ore. -- Sydney McLaughlin took the last victorious lap of an All-American world championships Sunday, pulling away in the 4x400-meter relay to close a U.S. runaway and give the Americans thei… [+2171 chars]

articles.title: Washington Nationals' Victor Robles jabs back at Madison Bumgarner by sporting clown nose
articles.description: Victor Robles sported a clown nose on Sunday, a day after Diamondbacks pitcher Madison Bumgarner called him a "clown" for admiring his eighth-inning homer in a blowout loss.
articles.content:
PHOENIX -- LeBron James liked the clown nose. Dave Martinez wasn't as big of a fan.
Sorry skip, it appears Washington Nationals outfielder Victor Robles is siding with the NBA superstar on this one.… [+1315 chars]

articles.title: As deadline looms, MLB counters with final international draft offer, sources say
articles.description: With a deadline looming, MLB on Sunday submitted what was billed as a final offer regarding an international draft, sources told ESPN, increasing the amount that would be guaranteed to the top 600 international players from $181 million to $191 million.
articles.content:

articles.title: Chase Elliott given win at Pocono after Denny Hamlin, Kyle Busch disqualified
articles.description: Chase Elliott was given the victory Sunday at Pocono Raceway after Denny Hamlin and Kyle Busch were disqualified.
articles.content:
LONG POND, Pa. -- NASCAR stripped Denny Hamlin of his win at Pocono Raceway when his No. 11 Toyota failed inspection and was disqualified, awarding Chase Elliott the Cup Series victory.

articles.title: David Ortiz, the first career designated hitter to be selected on first ballot, headlines Baseball Hall of Fame's induction ceremony
articles.description: The National Baseball Hall of Fame inducted seven new members during an induction ceremony on Sunday, but the afternoon of remembrance belonged to former Red Sox star David Ortiz in Cooperstown, New York.

articles.title: Houston Texans WR John Metchie III diagnosed with leukemia
articles.description: Houston Texans rookie wide receiver John Metchie III announced Sunday that he has been diagnosed with a form of leukemia and likely will not play this season.
